participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

wps_q1_y.Description: I get as much information as I can. | 1 = Never; 2 = A Little; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Pretty Often; 5 = Usually

wps_q2_y.Description: I think hard about what steps to take. | 1 = Never; 2 = A Little; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Pretty Often; 5 = Usually

wps_q3_y.Description: I think about the choices before I do anything. | 1 = Never; 2 = A Little; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Pretty Often; 5 = Usually

wps_q4_y.Description: I think of different ways to take care of it. | 1 = Never; 2 = A Little; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Pretty Often; 5 = Usually

wps_q5_y.Description: I try different ways to solve the problem. | 1 = Never; 2 = A Little; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Pretty Often; 5 = Usually

wps_q6_y.Description: I do something to try to solve the problem. | 1 = Never; 2 = A Little; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Pretty Often; 5 = Usually

wps_admin.Description: Please indicate how instrument was administered: | 1=RA-Administered ; 2=Youth Self-Administered ; 3=Combination

wps_ss_sum.Description: WPS SumSum[wps_q1_y. wps_q2_y. wps_q3_y,wps_q4_y, wps_q5_y, wps_q6_y]Validation: Minimum of 4 items answered (4 answers other than not applicable = 0)
